content: Tesla Inc  on Friday got high-profile orders from Wal-Mart Stores Inc  and fleet operator J.B. Hunt  for its future electric truck  but would-be customers indicated they are giving the big rig a try  not buying in volume.
name: JB Hunt Transport Services Inc
title: J.B. Hunt  Wal-Mart climb aboard Tesla's electric truck

content: Nov 17 Tesla Inc on Friday got high-profile orders from Wal-Mart Stores Inc and fleet operator J.B. Hunt for its future electric truck  but would-be customers indicated they are giving the big rig a try  not buying in volume.
name: JB Hunt Transport Services Inc
title: UPDATE 4-J.B. Hunt  Wal-Mart climb aboard Tesla's electric truck

content: Nov 17 Trucking company J.B. Hunt Transport Services Inc said on Friday it placed a reservation to purchase Tesla Inc's Semi trucks.
name: JB Hunt Transport Services Inc
title: Trucking company J.B. Hunt reserves Tesla trucks
